sqlMap.select:
select * from sys_user_info where is_valid = '1'
user_pwd=#userPwd#
user_name=#userName#
select i.user_type_code from sys_user_info u,user_type_info i where u.user_id=#userId# and u.user_type_id=i.user_type_id

select u.*,info.user_type_name from sys_user_info u left join user_type_info info on u.user_type_id=info.user_type_id
u.user_name like '%$userName$%'
u.email like '%$email$%'
u.user_type_id=#userType#
(u.reg_date>#starttime# or u.reg_date like '%$starttime$%')
(u.reg_date<#endtime# or u.reg_date like '%$endtime$%')
order by u.reg_date desc
select user_type_id,user_type_name from user_type_info t where user_type_id in (#ids#)

select distinct a.* from auth_info a, auth_group_member b, sys_POST_INFO c, sys_POST_USER d where a.auth_id = b.auth_id and b.auth_group_id = c.POST_CODE and c.POST_ID = d.POST_ID and d.user_id = #userid# and a.IS_VALID = '1' and b.IS_VALID = '1' and c.IS_VALID = '1' and d.IS_VALID = '1'

select ui.user_id,ui.org_id,ui.gender,ui.nation,ui.name,bpu.post_id,bpu.is_valid,bpu.post_user_id from (select us.* from sys_user_info us where us.org_id=#orgId# and us.is_valid = '1') ui left join (select * from sys_post_user where post_id=#postId# and is_valid = '1') bpu on ui.user_id=bpu.user_id
